name: Shadow Puppy Shenanigans
description:
In a submerged city, a raccoon with duality of light & shadow solves mystic challenges to steal ALL the snacks. 

Hop into a comedy puzzle game with dystopian-pop aesthetic & hip-hop music.

Team:

Toni Sariola : Programmer, Game Designer

Prabhav Bhatnagar : Programmer, Game Designer

Boeun Kim : Artist

Rolands Tiss : Programmer

Sina Jalali *(till Jan 2022) : Programmer
